name: eviolite
effect:
Held by a Pokémon that is not fully evolved
:   Holder has 1.5× Defense and Special Defense.
short_effect: Held: Holder has 1.5× Defense and Special Defense, as long as it's not fully evolved.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A mysterious Evolutionary lump. When
held by a Pokémon that can still evolve,
it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A mysterious Evolutionary lump. When held by a
Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both
Defense and Sp. Def.
